Text: ".......temperamentsfulla horan Ilya......." - såna uttryck gör att en bann kommer på TN

IMPORTANT: There are NO English subs on this rip, so the portions of the movie spoken in Greek and Russian will be lost to you unless you know Swedish or Norwegian (or Greek and Russian).

While the original English trailer is included, the only other extras are still photo galleries and biography screens (in English) and no less than trailers for seven other films.

Better to get the other DVDR rip with the original Greek title ("Pote tin Kyriaki") at:

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6949572/Pote_tin_Kyriaki_%28Never_on_Sunday%29_%5B1960_PAL_DVD%5D%5BEn.De.Fr.It.Es

In has subs in nine languages (including English), and five audio tracks, but no extras at all.
